div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2340 Puig Castellar, Barcelona prov., c. 1940 Burial: c. 195 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 200 AR Emporiae: 14 dr. 27 ob. 12 hemiob. Iberian: 3 dr. (Emporitan type) Disposition: Barcelona (Inst. de Arqu.) part Pericot, Ampurias 1943, p. 202; 1944, p. 323, illus. † Beltran y Villagrasa, Ampurias 1945-6, pp. 311-5 † Maluquer-Oliva, Pyrenae 1965, pp. 115-22 de Guadan, MPER, pp. 144-50
